query.name: org.billingsschools.pq.library_patrons_elem
query.sql:
with config as ( select case when t.firstday > sysdate then t.firstday else sysdate end effdate from terms t where t.id = (extract(year from sysdate) + case when extract(month from sysdate) >= 7 then 1 else 0 end - 1991) * 100 and t.schoolid = 0 and t.isyearrec = 1 )
, studentemail as ( select ssm.studentsdcid, psc.email from psm_studentcontact psc inner join sync_studentmap ssm on ssm.studentid = psc.studentid inner join psm_studentcontacttype psct on psct.id = psc.studentcontacttypeid and psct.name = 'Self' where psc.email is not null )
select lpad(students.student_number, 8, '0') "user alt ID" , '20620' || lpad(students.student_number, 9, '0') "user ID" , 2 "address flag" , studentemail.email "address 2 - email address" , sections.room "department" , upper(substr(users.last_name, 1, 14)) "group id" , 'BS2-' || u_school_codes.sirsi "library" , 'BS2-STU' || case students.grade_level when 0 then 'K' else to_char(students.grade_level) end "profile" , case students.grade_level when 0 then 'KINDER' when 1 then '1ST-GRADE' when 2 then '2ND-GRADE' when 3 then '3RD-GRADE' when 9 then 'FRESHMAN' when 10 then 'SOPHOMORE' when 11 then 'JUNIOR' when 12 then 'SENIOR' else students.grade_level || 'TH-GRADE' end "user category3" , case students.gender when 'M' then 'MALE' when 'F' then 'FEMALE' end "user category8" , substr(upper(students.first_name), 1, 25) "first name" , substr(upper(students.last_name), 1, 60) "last name" from students left join cc on students.id = cc.studentid left join sections on sections.id = cc.sectionid left join schools on schools.school_number = students.enrollment_schoolid left join u_school_codes on u_school_codes.schoolsdcid = schools.dcid left join schoolstaff on schoolstaff.id = cc.teacherid left join users on users.dcid = schoolstaff.users_dcid left join u_def_ext_students on u_def_ext_students.studentsdcid = students.dcid left join (select * from studentemail) studentemail on studentemail.studentsdcid = students.dcid where students.enroll_status in (-1, 0) and cc.dateenrolled < (select effdate from config) + 7 and cc.dateleft >= (select effdate from config) and students.schoolid not in (79438) and coalesce(u_def_ext_students.remote_learning, 0) != 1 and ( ( students.grade_level in (0,1,2,3,4,5) and cc.course_number in ('KD', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5') ) )
order by students.lastfirst

query.name: org.billingsschools.pq.library_patrons_mshs
query.summary: BPS - Library Patrons MS and HS
query.description: Library patron load files - middle school and high school
query.sql:
with config as ( select case when t.firstday > sysdate then t.firstday else sysdate end effdate from terms t where t.id = (extract(year from sysdate) + case when extract(month from sysdate) >= 7 then 1 else 0 end - 1991) * 100 and t.schoolid = 0 and t.isyearrec = 1 )
, schedules as ( select cc.studentid , users.last_name teacher , sections.room , dense_rank() over(partition by cc.studentid order by cc.dateenrolled, cc.id) rnk from cc left join sections on sections.id = cc.sectionid left join section_meeting on section_meeting.sectionid = sections.id left join schoolstaff on schoolstaff.id = cc.teacherid left join users on users.dcid = schoolstaff.users_dcid left join students on students.id = cc.studentid where cc.dateenrolled <= (select effdate from config) + 7 and cc.dateleft >= (select effdate from config) and ( ( students.grade_level in (6,7,8) and section_meeting.period_number = 6 and section_meeting.cycle_day_letter = 'A' ) or ( students.grade_level in (9,10,11,12) and section_meeting.period_number = 3 and section_meeting.cycle_day_letter = 'A' ) ) )
, studentemail as ( select ssm.studentsdcid, psc.email from psm_studentcontact psc inner join sync_studentmap ssm on ssm.studentid = psc.studentid inner join psm_studentcontacttype psct on psct.id = psc.studentcontacttypeid and psct.name = 'Self' where psc.email is not null )
select lpad(students.student_number, 8, '0') "user alt ID" , '20620' || lpad(students.student_number, 9, '0') "user ID" , 2 "address flag" , studentemail.email "address 2 - email address" , schedules.room "department" , upper(substr(schedules.teacher, 1, 14)) "group id" , 'BS2-' || u_school_codes.sirsi "library" , 'BS2-STU' || case students.grade_level when 0 then 'K' else to_char(students.grade_level) end "profile" , case students.grade_level when 0 then 'KINDER' when 1 then '1ST-GRADE' when 2 then '2ND-GRADE' when 3 then '3RD-GRADE' when 9 then 'FRESHMAN' when 10 then 'SOPHOMORE' when 11 then 'JUNIOR' when 12 then 'SENIOR' else students.grade_level || 'TH-GRADE' end "user category3" , case students.gender when 'M' then 'MALE' when 'F' then 'FEMALE' end "user category8" , substr(upper(students.first_name), 1, 25) "first name" , substr(upper(students.last_name), 1, 60) "last name" from students left join schools on schools.school_number = students.enrollment_schoolid left join u_school_codes on u_school_codes.schoolsdcid = schools.dcid left join u_def_ext_students on u_def_ext_students.studentsdcid = students.dcid left join (select * from studentemail) studentemail on studentemail.studentsdcid = students.dcid left join (select * from schedules) schedules on schedules.studentid = students.id and schedules.rnk = 1 where students.enroll_status in (-1, 0) and students.schoolid not in (79438) and coalesce(u_def_ext_students.remote_learning, 0) != 1
order by students.lastfirst
